name: 王伯雅
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1 0911-0916	Orientation 
Week 2 0918-0923	Complete Listening practice
Week 3 0925-0930	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 4 1002-1007	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 5 1009-1014	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 6 1016-1021	Complete Reading practice
Week 7 1023-1028	Reading training/Vocabulary
Week 8 1030-1104	Reading training/Vocabulary
Week 9 1106-1111	Midterm Week
Week 10 1113-1118	Grammar
Week 11 1120-1125	Grammar
Week 12 1127-1202	Mock Test1
Week 13 1204-1209	Discussion
Week 14 1211-1216	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 15 1218-1223	Reading training/Vocabulary
Week 16 1225-1230	Mock Test2
Week 17 0101-0106	Discussion 
Week 18 0108-0113	Final Week
scorePolicy:
會考20%
期中&期末考試50% (Easy Test線上題庫)
其他30%
